trans-unit.resname: RVR·1 | Karn, the Great Creator | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Karn, the Great Creator
trans-unit.target: 万创卡恩

trans-unit.resname: RVR·1 | Karn, the Great Creator | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Activated abilities of artifacts your opponents control can't be activated.
trans-unit.target: 由对手操控的神器之起动式异能都不能起动。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·1 | Karn, the Great Creator | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: +1: Until your next turn, up to one target noncreature artifact becomes an artifact creature with power and toughness each equal to its mana value.
trans-unit.target: +1：直到你的下一个回合，至多一个目标非生物神器成为神器生物，其力量和防御力各等同于其法术力值。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·1 | Karn, the Great Creator | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: −2: You may reveal an artifact card you own from outside the game or choose a face-up artifact card you own in exile. Put that card into your hand.
trans-unit.target: −2：你可以从游戏外展示一张由你拥有的神器牌或选择一张放逐区中由你拥有且牌面朝上的神器牌。将该牌置于你手上。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·2 | Angelic Exaltation | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Angelic Exaltation
trans-unit.target: 天使颂赞

trans-unit.resname: RVR·2 | Angelic Exaltation | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, it gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of creatures you control.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个由你操控的生物单独攻击时，它得+X/+X直到回合结束，X为由你操控的生物数量。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·2 | Angelic Exaltation | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "If we cannot have peace, we will have justice."\n—Aurelia
trans-unit.target: 「如果和平不保，我们必将昭彰正义。」\n～欧瑞梨

trans-unit.resname: RVR·3 | Armory Guard | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Armory Guard
trans-unit.target: 军械库守卫

trans-unit.resname: RVR·3 | Armory Guard | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME has vigilance as long as you control a Gate.
trans-unit.target: 只要你操控门，CARDNAME便具有警戒异能。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·3 | Armory Guard | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The Dimir agents watched from the shadows. "Eight hours, and I've yet to see him blink," Nefara hissed. "I suggest we find another way in."
trans-unit.target: 底密尔密探在阴影中监视着。「八小时了，我还没看到他眨眼。」涅法拉低声咒骂。「我们还是另寻入口吧。」

trans-unit.resname: RVR·4 | Arrester's Zeal | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Arrester's Zeal
trans-unit.target: 逮捕人热忱

trans-unit.resname: RVR·4 | Arrester's Zeal | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 目标生物得+2/+2直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·4 | Arrester's Zeal | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Addendum — If you cast this spell during your main phase, that creature gains flying until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 附案～如果你是在你的行动阶段施放此咒语，则该生物获得飞行异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·4 | Arrester's Zeal | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Law is the light of civilization."
trans-unit.target: 「律法是文明之光。」

trans-unit.resname: RVR·5 | Azorius Arrester | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Azorius Arrester
trans-unit.target: 俄佐立逮捕人

trans-unit.resname: RVR·5 | Azorius Arrester | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, detain target creature an opponent controls. (Until your next turn, that creature can't attack or block and its activated abilities can't be activated.)
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，拘留目标由对手操控的生物。（直到你的下一个回合，该生物不能进行攻击或阻挡，其起动式异能也不能起动。）

trans-unit.resname: RVR·5 | Azorius Arrester | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "You have the right to remain silent. Mostly because I tire of your excuses."
trans-unit.target: 「你有权保持缄默。主要是因为我懒得听你找藉口。」

trans-unit.resname: RVR·6 | Azorius Justiciar | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Azorius Justiciar
trans-unit.target: 俄佐立大司法

trans-unit.resname: RVR·6 | Azorius Justiciar | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, detain up to two target creatures your opponents control. (Until your next turn, those creatures can't attack or block and their activated abilities can't be activated.)
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，拘留至多两个目标由对手操控的生物。（直到你的下一个回合，这些生物不能进行攻击或阻挡，其起动式异能也不能起动。）

trans-unit.resname: RVR·6 | Azorius Justiciar | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Your potential to commit a crime warrants further investigation."
trans-unit.target: 「你有犯罪的可能性，因此有必要进一步调查。」

trans-unit.resname: RVR·7 | Basilica Guards | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Basilica Guards
trans-unit.target: 大教堂守卫

trans-unit.resname: RVR·7 | Basilica Guards | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Defender
trans-unit.target: 守军

trans-unit.resname: RVR·7 | Basilica Guards | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Extort (Whenever you cast a spell, you may pay {WB}. If you do, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain that much life.)
trans-unit.target: 敲诈（每当你施放咒语时，你可以支付{W/B}。若你如此作，则每位对手各失去1点生命，且你获得等量的生命。）

trans-unit.resname: RVR·7 | Basilica Guards | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "None may pass . . . for free."
trans-unit.target: 「无人可以…通过而不付代价。」

trans-unit.resname: RVR·8 | Blazing Archon | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Blazing Archon
trans-unit.target: 辉光统领

trans-unit.resname: RVR·8 | Blazing Archon | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.resname: RVR·8 | Blazing Archon | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Creatures can't attack you.
trans-unit.target: 生物不能攻击你。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·8 | Blazing Archon | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Through the haze of battle I saw the glint of sun on golden mane, the sheen of glory clad in mail, and I dropped my sword and wept at the idiocy of war."\n—Dravin, Gruul deserter
trans-unit.target: 「在滚滚战尘中，我见到金色鬃毛上闪耀的阳光，荣誉之光辉披甲现身；我于是丢下了剑，为身处这愚蠢战争而流泪。」\n～古鲁叛逃者卓文

trans-unit.resname: RVR·9 | Blind Obedience | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Blind Obedience
trans-unit.target: 盲目服从

trans-unit.resname: RVR·9 | Blind Obedience | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Extort (Whenever you cast a spell, you may pay {WB}. If you do, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain that much life.)
trans-unit.target: 敲诈（每当你施放咒语时，你可以支付{W/B}。若你如此作，则每位对手各失去1点生命，且你获得等量的生命。）

trans-unit.resname: RVR·9 | Blind Obedience | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Artifacts and creatures your opponents control enter the battlefield tapped.
trans-unit.target: 由对手操控的神器与生物须横置进战场。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·9 | Blind Obedience | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "By the time your knees have worn through your robe, you may have begun to learn your place."
trans-unit.target: 「跪到长袍磨破时，你就会明白自己的地位到哪里。」

trans-unit.resname: RVR·10 | Boros Elite | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Boros Elite
trans-unit.target: 波洛斯精兵

trans-unit.resname: RVR·10 | Boros Elite | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Battalion — Whenever CARDNAME and at least two other creatures attack, CARDNAME gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 协战～每当CARDNAME与至少两个其他生物攻击时，CARDNAME得+2/+2直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·10 | Boros Elite | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "First, you must fight among the rank and file. It is there I will discern your skills as a leader."\n—Aurelia, to Gideon Jura
trans-unit.target: 「你必须先与士兵一同奋战，我才能看出你的领袖才能。」\n～欧瑞梨告诉基定尤拉

trans-unit.resname: RVR·11 | Bulwark Giant | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Bulwark Giant
trans-unit.target: 援护巨人

trans-unit.resname: RVR·11 | Bulwark Giant | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you gain 5 life.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，你获得5点生命。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·11 | Bulwark Giant | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Where did *she* come from? More importantly, are there more like her?"\n—Gideon Jura
trans-unit.target: 「她从哪来的？更重要的是，还有更多她这样的人吗？」\n～基定尤拉

trans-unit.resname: RVR·12 | Carom | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Carom
trans-unit.target: 借力打力

trans-unit.resname: RVR·12 | Carom | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: The next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn is dealt to another target creature instead.
trans-unit.target: 于本回合中，接下来将对目标生物造成的1点伤害，改为对另一个目标生物造成之。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·12 | Carom | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·12 | Carom | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Her enemy's strength is her own.
trans-unit.target: 敌人的力量使她更强壮。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·13 | Conclave Equenaut | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Conclave Equenaut
trans-unit.target: 盟会飞马骑士

trans-unit.resname: RVR·13 | Conclave Equenaut | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)
trans-unit.target: 召集（此咒语能用你的生物来协助施放。你于施放此咒语时每横置一个生物，就能为此咒语支付{1}或一点该生物颜色之法术力。）

trans-unit.resname: RVR·13 | Conclave Equenaut | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.resname: RVR·13 | Conclave Equenaut | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Equenauts are the seeds of the Conclave, scattered on the four winds, searching for new places to take root.
trans-unit.target: 飞马骑士是盟会的种子，乘风飞向四方，寻找适合生根茁壮的新领域。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·14 | Condemn | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Condemn
trans-unit.target: 判罪

trans-unit.resname: RVR·14 | Condemn | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Put target attacking creature on the bottom of its owner's library. Its controller gains life equal to its toughness.
trans-unit.target: 将目标进行攻击的生物置于其拥有者的牌库底。其操控者获得等同于其防御力的生命。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·14 | Condemn | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "No doubt the arbiters would put you away, after all the documents are signed. But I will have justice now."\n—Alovnek, Boros guildmage
trans-unit.target: 「既然需签署的文件一无遗漏，仲裁者当然会放过你。但我现在就要主持正义！」\n～波洛斯公会法师阿劳涅

trans-unit.resname: RVR·15 | Devouring Light | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Devouring Light
trans-unit.target: 明光吞噬

trans-unit.resname: RVR·15 | Devouring Light | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)
trans-unit.target: 召集（此咒语能用你的生物来协助施放。你于施放此咒语时每横置一个生物，就能为此咒语支付{1}或一点该生物颜色之法术力。）

trans-unit.resname: RVR·15 | Devouring Light | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Exile target attacking or blocking creature.
trans-unit.target: 放逐目标进行攻击或阻挡的生物。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·15 | Devouring Light | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Into the light the good are welcomed, and with the light the evil are banished.
trans-unit.target: 明光将包容善者、放逐恶徒。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·16 | Divine Visitation | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Divine Visitation
trans-unit.target: 神恩天降

trans-unit.resname: RVR·16 | Divine Visitation | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: If one or more creature tokens would be created under your control, that many 4/4 white Angel creature tokens with flying and vigilance are created instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果将在你操控下派出一个或数个衍生生物，则改为派出等量的4/4白色，具飞行与警戒异能的天使衍生生物。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·17 | Eyes in the Skies | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Eyes in the Skies
trans-unit.target: 苍穹之眼

trans-unit.resname: RVR·17 | Eyes in the Skies | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Create a 1/1 white Bird creature token with flying, then populate. (Create a token that's a copy of a creature token you control.)
trans-unit.target: 派出一个1/1白色，具飞行异能的鸟衍生生物，然后殖民。（派出一个衍生物，此衍生物为由你操控的某衍生生物之复制品。）

trans-unit.resname: RVR·17 | Eyes in the Skies | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "What root and branch cannot reach, our winged friends will attend to."\n—Zunak, Selesnya strategist
trans-unit.target: 「根须和枝杈无法触及之处，长翅膀的朋友会替我们照看。」\n～瑟雷尼亚战术家祖奈

trans-unit.resname: RVR·18 | Faith's Fetters | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Faith's Fetters
trans-unit.target: 信念拘锁

trans-unit.resname: RVR·18 | Faith's Fetters | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Enchant permanent
trans-unit.target: 结附于永久物

trans-unit.resname: RVR·18 | Faith's Fetters | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you gain 4 life.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，你获得4点生命。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·18 | Faith's Fetters | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Enchanted permanent can't attack or block, and its activated abilities can't be activated unless they're mana abilities.
trans-unit.target: 所结附的永久物不能进行攻击或阻挡，且除了法术力异能之外，其起动式异能也不能起动。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·19 | Ghostway | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Ghostway
trans-unit.target: 鬼影密径

trans-unit.resname: RVR·19 | Ghostway | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Exile each creature you control. Return those cards to the battlefield under their owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.
trans-unit.target: 放逐所有由你操控的生物。在下一个结束步骤开始时，将这些牌在其拥有者的操控下移回战场。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·19 | Ghostway | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "I watched its blade swing through me, but I was hollow, empty. I saw its face contort in rage but could not hear it snarl."\n—Klattic, Boros legionnaire
trans-unit.target: 「我看着剑锋扫过，但自己的身体却是一片空无。我看着对方扭曲的愤怒面孔，却听不到他的叫骂。」\n～波洛斯军团兵喀拉提

trans-unit.resname: RVR·20 | Gideon Blackblade | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Gideon Blackblade
trans-unit.target: 乌锋基定

trans-unit.resname: RVR·20 | Gideon Blackblade | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: As long as it's your turn, CARDNAME is a 4/4 Human Soldier creature with indestructible that's still a planeswalker.
trans-unit.target: 只要是在你的回合中，CARDNAME便是4/4，具不灭异能的人类／士兵生物，且仍然是鹏洛客。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·20 | Gideon Blackblade | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to CARDNAME during your turn.
trans-unit.target: 防止于你的回合中将对CARDNAME造成的所有伤害。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·20 | Gideon Blackblade | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: +1: Up to one other target creature you control gains your choice of vigilance, lifelink, or indestructible until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: +1：选择警戒，系命或不灭。至多另一个目标由你操控的生物获得该异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·20 | Gideon Blackblade | Card Text | Paragraph 4
trans-unit.source: −6: Exile target nonland permanent.
trans-unit.target: −6：放逐目标非地永久物。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·21 | Keening Apparition | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Some souls are too damaged to be of use to the Orzhov.
trans-unit.target: 有的灵魂伤得太重，连欧佐夫都无法利用。

trans-unit.source: Battalion — Whenever CARDNAME and at least two other creatures attack, put a +1/+1 counter on CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 协战～每当CARDNAME与至少两个其他生物攻击时，在CARDNAME上放置一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·22 | Makeshift Battalion | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Their ranks are thin, their formation is improvised, their weapons are borrowed, and you'd best get out of their way.
trans-unit.target: 他们兵员薄弱，队形散乱，武器不整，但你最好还是躲着点。

trans-unit.target: 守责主礼人

trans-unit.resname: RVR·23 | Ministrant of Obligation | Card Text | Paragraph 1

trans-unit.target: 往生2（当此生物死去时，派出两个1/1，白黑双色，具飞行异能的精怪衍生生物。）

trans-unit.resname: RVR·23 | Ministrant of Obligation | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: When the price of your sins comes due, the Church of Deals is there to collect.
trans-unit.target: 罪行代价账期一到，行商教会便会上门收取。

trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.resname: RVR·24 | Mistral Charger | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Some sky steeds break from the thundering herd to ride free on the open winds.
trans-unit.target: 有些天马脱离大群，情愿随风自由翱翔。

trans-unit.target: 起义民众

trans-unit.resname: RVR·25 | Rising Populace | Card Text | Paragraph 1

trans-unit.resname: RVR·25 | Rising Populace | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Grief is a crucible where resolve is tempered.

trans-unit.resname: RVR·26 | Rootborn Defenses | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "No harm can come to me while the Worldsoul shelters me."

trans-unit.source: Addendum — If you cast this spell during your main phase, it deals 5 damage instead.
trans-unit.target: 附案～如果你是在你的行动阶段施放此咒语，则改为它造成5点伤害。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·27 | Summary Judgment | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Any challenge to Azorius authority is met with swift and potent retribution.

trans-unit.resname: RVR·28 | Sunhome Stalwart | Card Text | Paragraph 2

trans-unit.resname: RVR·55 | Quasiduplicate | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "My greatest creation—me!"
trans-unit.target: 「我最伟大的作品～我自己！」

trans-unit.target: 「如能恰当召唤，电浆球应会完全包裹攻击咒语，你还能听到一声饱嗝。」

trans-unit.target: 技艺纯熟的伊捷时法师，能在沙漏两粒沙落下的时间差里完成一回壮绝复仇。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·83 | Massacre Girl | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, each other creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn. Whenever a creature dies this turn, each creature other than CARDNAME gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，每个其他生物各得-1/-1直到回合结束。本回合中，每当一个生物死去时，CARDNAME以外的每个生物各得-1/-1直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·84 | Mausoleum Turnkey | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Mausoleum Turnkey
trans-unit.target: 陵墓看守

trans-unit.resname: RVR·84 | Mausoleum Turnkey | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, return target creature card of an opponent's choice from your graveyard to your hand.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，任一对手选择目标在你坟墓场中的生物牌，将该牌移回你手上。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·84 | Mausoleum Turnkey | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: When he reaches for his key ring, you should be running for the exit.
trans-unit.target: 要是他张手抓钥匙圈，你该张腿就跑。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·85 | Mephitic Vapors | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Mephitic Vapors
trans-unit.target: 恶臭毒气

trans-unit.resname: RVR·85 | Mephitic Vapors | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: All creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 所有生物得-1/-1直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·85 | Mephitic Vapors | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Surveil 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.)
trans-unit.target: 刺探2。（检视你牌库顶的两张牌，然后将其中任意数量置入你坟墓场，其余则以任意顺序置于你牌库顶。）

trans-unit.resname: RVR·85 | Mephitic Vapors | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Ravnica's safest strongholds are often neither.
trans-unit.target: 拉尼卡最安全的堡垒通常既不安全也保不住人。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·86 | Midnight Reaper | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 午夜镰刀手

trans-unit.source: Whenever a nontoken creature you control dies, CARDNAME deals 1 damage to you and you draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个由你操控且非衍生物的生物死去时，CARDNAME对你造成1点伤害且你抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·86 | Midnight Reaper | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: No one welcomes his visit, yet all must grant him tribute.
trans-unit.target: 无人欢迎他的到来，但人人都得奉上贡品。

trans-unit.target: 往生1（当此生物死去时，派出一个1/1，白黑双色，具飞行异能的精怪衍生生物。）

trans-unit.resname: RVR·87 | Orzhov Enforcer | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "You'll pay what you owe, with your money or your life."
trans-unit.target: 「欠下的债都得还，用钱用命都可以。」

trans-unit.resname: RVR·88 | Orzhov Euthanist | Card Text | Paragraph 1

trans-unit.target: 缠身（当此生物死去时，将它放逐并缠身在目标生物上。）

trans-unit.resname: RVR·88 | Orzhov Euthanist | Card Text | Paragraph 2

trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场或它所缠身的生物死去时，消灭目标本回合中受过伤害的生物。

trans-unit.target: 播疫师

trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，每位牌手各牺牲一个生物或鹏洛客。每位无法如此作的牌手各弃一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·89 | Plaguecrafter | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "My power is generosity, in a way. I give my survivors an appreciation for their lives."
trans-unit.target: 「我的能力可谓慷慨。我让从我手下幸存的人对生命心怀感恩。」

trans-unit.resname: RVR·90 | Priest of Forgotten Gods | Card Text | Paragraph 1

trans-unit.target: {T}，牺牲两个其他生物：任意数量的目标牌手各失去2点生命且牺牲一个生物。你加{B}{B}且抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·90 | Priest of Forgotten Gods | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The Orzhov are not the only religious tradition on Ravnica, nor the oldest.
trans-unit.target: 欧佐夫既不是拉尼卡唯一的宗教教派，也不算最古老的一个。

trans-unit.target: 沼泽行者（只要防御牌手操控沼泽，此生物便不能被阻挡。）

trans-unit.target: 食腐{2}{B}（{2}{B}，从你的坟墓场放逐此牌：在目标生物上放置若干+1/+1指示物，其数量等同于此牌的力量。只能于法术时机食腐。）

trans-unit.resname: RVR·96 | Undercity's Embrace | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The undercity is always hungry.

trans-unit.target: 每当另一个由你操控的生物死去时，CARDNAME向每位对手各造成1点伤害且你获得1点生命。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·97 | Vindictive Vampire | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: In theory, the Guildpact keeps guild feuds from spiraling out of control. Personal feuds, however, are not covered.
trans-unit.target: 理论上，十会盟能管住公会世仇不致一发而不可收。但私人宿怨就管不到了。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·98 | Woebringer Demon | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Each soul he devours adds its hunger to his own.
trans-unit.target: 他吞下的每个灵魂，都让自己更加饥饿。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·99 | Act of Treason | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Seen through Rakdos eyes, a cruel betrayal is a hilarious stunt.
trans-unit.target: 在拉铎司人眼中看来，残酷背叛不过是一场特技表演。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·100 | Arclight Phoenix | Card Text | Paragraph 2

trans-unit.resname: RVR·100 | Arclight Phoenix | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Some storms never blow over.

trans-unit.target: 脱缰（你可以让此生物进战场时上面有一个+1/+1指示物。只要其上有+1/+1指示物，它便不能进行阻挡。）

trans-unit.resname: RVR·101 | Bloodfray Giant | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The star performer of the Juri Revue, his shows have fans and blood spilling into the street.

trans-unit.resname: RVR·102 | Bomber Corps | Card Text | Paragraph 1

trans-unit.target: 协战～每当CARDNAME与至少两个其他生物攻击时，CARDNAME对任意一个目标造成1点伤害。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·102 | Bomber Corps | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Subtlety is for lawmages and spies."
trans-unit.target: 「律法师和间谍才用得到精密细心。」

trans-unit.resname: RVR·103 | Burn Bright | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 怒火冲天

trans-unit.resname: RVR·103 | Burn Bright | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Creatures you control get +2/+0 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 由你操控的生物得+2/+0直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·103 | Burn Bright | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "From a great bonfire at the dawn of time, the first Gruul kindled their rage. The same flame burns in you."\n—Kroshkar, Gruul shaman
trans-unit.target: 「古鲁人血液中的怒火，从先人在创世之初升起第一簇盛大篝火起就开始燃烧，一直延续至今。这股怒火同样也在你的体内燃烧。」\n～古鲁祭师克许卡

trans-unit.resname: RVR·104 | Burning Prophet | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 灼热先知

trans-unit.target: 每当你施放非生物咒语时，CARDNAME得+1/+0直到回合结束，然后占卜1。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·104 | Burning Prophet | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "This day will end in death, but not the one you hoped for. This day will end in victory, but not the one you expected."
trans-unit.target: 「这天终会有人丧生，但非你所愿之日。这日终会有人得胜，但非你所料之时。」

trans-unit.target: 起事（于此生物进战场时，你选择「+1/+1指示物」或「敏捷」。它进战场时上面有所选加成。）

trans-unit.resname: RVR·105 | Burning-Tree Vandal | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME attacks, you may discard a card. If you do, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME攻击时，你可以弃一张牌。若你如此作，则抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·105 | Burning-Tree Vandal | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The ostentatious splendor of the Orzhov church was just asking to be smashed.
trans-unit.target: 欧佐夫教堂那过于浮夸的壮丽装潢，仿佛就想让人把它尽数砸烂。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·106 | Demolish | Card Name

trans-unit.resname: RVR·106 | Demolish | Card Text | Paragraph 1

trans-unit.target: 消灭目标神器或地。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·106 | Demolish | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "For every inch of land they take from us, we take it back or we burn it. Give them nothing."\n—Aurelia
trans-unit.target: 「他们从我们手中夺走的每一寸土地，抢不回来的就给我烧干净。什么都不给他们留下。」\n～欧瑞梨

trans-unit.target: CARDNAME对任意一个目标造成X点伤害。如果本回合中曾以此法受到伤害的生物将死去，则改为将它放逐。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·107 | Demonfire | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Hellbent — If you have no cards in hand, this spell can't be countered and the damage can't be prevented.
trans-unit.target: 背水战～如果你没有手牌，则此咒语不能被反击且伤害不能被防止。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·109 | Greater Forgeling | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Few have seen the inner workings of Ravnica's furnaces, but neighboring districts catch brief glimpses in the horrors that escape the flames.
trans-unit.target: 很少有人见过拉尼卡锻冶炉内部的运作状况，但附近的城区曾看到自火焰窜出的恐怖身影一闪而过。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·110 | Guttersnipe | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 贫窟伏击客

trans-unit.resname: RVR·110 | Guttersnipe | Card Text | Paragraph 1

trans-unit.target: 每当你施放瞬间或法术咒语时，CARDNAME向每位对手各造成2点伤害。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·110 | Guttersnipe | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: He wants to watch Ravnica burn, one soul at a time.
trans-unit.target: 他想看着拉尼卡陷入火海，生灵给一个个烧死。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·111 | Hellkite Tyrant | Card Text | Paragraph 1

trans-unit.target: 飞行，践踏

trans-unit.resname: RVR·111 | Hellkite Tyrant | Card Text | Paragraph 2

trans-unit.resname: RVR·111 | Hellkite Tyrant | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control twenty or more artifacts, you win the game.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，若你操控二十个或更多神器，则你赢得这盘游戏。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·112 | Homing Lightning | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "I see countless worlds. What makes them think I can't find them in just one?"\n—Ral Zarek
trans-unit.target: 「我能看到的世界数之不尽。它们怎么会觉得我无法在一个世界中将其尽寻？」\n～拉尔查雷克

trans-unit.resname: RVR·113 | Ilharg, the Raze-Boar | Card Name

trans-unit.resname: RVR·113 | Ilharg, the Raze-Boar | Card Text | Paragraph 3

trans-unit.target: 「那个巨人根本就没看见我，更别说逮住我！我都近得能闻到他身上的味道了。当然，这没什么好炫耀的。」

trans-unit.resname: RVR·131 | Arboreal Grazer | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "We fight to stop a tyrant, but we also fight for the gentle creatures who have no concept of what befalls their world."\n—Vivien Reid

trans-unit.source: In times of peril, the vision the ancient paruns had for their city comes into focus.

trans-unit.target: 从CARDNAME上移去两个+1/+1指示物：重生CARDNAME。（此生物下一次将被消灭时，改为将它横置、移出战斗，并治愈其上所有伤害。）

trans-unit.resname: RVR·138 | Farseek | Card Name

trans-unit.resname: RVR·138 | Farseek | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "How truly vast this city must be, that I have traveled so far and seen so much, yet never once found the place where the buildings fail."

trans-unit.resname: RVR·141 | Forced Landing | Flavor Text

trans-unit.target: 看护植物园的德鲁伊只晓得一种咒语：滋养植物快速生长的符咒。当飞空永生者入侵她的地界时，她必须发挥创意。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·194 | Kaya, Orzhov Usurper | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: +1: Exile up to two target cards from a single graveyard. You gain 2 life if at least one creature card was exiled this way.
trans-unit.target: +1：将至多两张目标在同一坟墓场中的牌放逐。如果以此法放逐了至少一张生物牌，则你获得2点生命。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·194 | Kaya, Orzhov Usurper | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: −1: Exile target nonland permanent with mana value 1 or less.
trans-unit.target: −1：放逐目标法术力值等于或小于1的非地永久物。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·194 | Kaya, Orzhov Usurper | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: −5: CARDNAME deals damage to target player equal to the number of cards that player owns in exile and you gain that much life.
trans-unit.target: −5：CARDNAME对目标牌手造成伤害，其数量等同于放逐区中由该牌手拥有之牌的数量，且你获得等量的生命。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·195 | Lavinia, Azorius Renegade | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Lavinia, Azorius Renegade
trans-unit.target: 俄佐立变节者拉温妮

trans-unit.resname: RVR·195 | Lavinia, Azorius Renegade | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Each opponent can't cast noncreature spells with mana value greater than the number of lands that player controls.
trans-unit.target: 每位对手均不能施放法术力值大于由其操控之地数量的非生物咒语。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·195 | Lavinia, Azorius Renegade | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever an opponent casts a spell, if no mana was spent to cast it, counter that spell.
trans-unit.target: 每当任一对手施放咒语，若施放它时未支付过法术力，则反击该咒语。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·195 | Lavinia, Azorius Renegade | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "I told Jace that Ravnica would fall apart if he didn't take his responsibilities seriously. I didn't want to be right."
trans-unit.target: 「我曾告诉杰斯，如果他不认真肩负起自己的责任，拉尼卡便会分崩离析。我多希望自己错了。」

trans-unit.resname: RVR·196 | Lazav, the Multifarious | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Lazav, the Multifarious
trans-unit.target: 百相拉札夫

trans-unit.resname: RVR·196 | Lazav, the Multifarious | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.)
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，刺探1。（检视你牌库顶的牌。你可以将其置入你的坟墓场。）

trans-unit.resname: RVR·196 | Lazav, the Multifarious | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {X}: CARDNAME becomes a copy of target creature card in your graveyard with mana value X, except its name is CARDNAME, it's legendary in addition to its other types, and it has this ability.
trans-unit.target: {X}：选择目标在你坟墓场中且法术力值为X的生物牌。CARDNAME成为该牌的复制品，但其名称仍是CARDNAME，额外具有传奇此超类别，且具有此异能。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·197 | Lightning Helix | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Lightning Helix
trans-unit.target: 闪电螺旋

trans-unit.resname: RVR·197 | Lightning Helix | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME deals 3 damage to any target and you gain 3 life.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME对任意一个目标造成3点伤害，且你获得3点生命。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·197 | Lightning Helix | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Though less well-known than its army of soldiers, the Boros Legion's mage-priests are as respected by the innocent as they are hated by the ghosts of the guilty.
trans-unit.target: 虽然波洛斯教团是以士兵的实力而闻名，但其麾下的法师僧侣也同样受善人敬重，遭恶徒憎厌。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·198 | Master of Cruelties | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Master of Cruelties
trans-unit.target: 暴行大师

trans-unit.resname: RVR·198 | Master of Cruelties | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: First strike, deathtouch
trans-unit.target: 先攻，死触

trans-unit.resname: RVR·198 | Master of Cruelties | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME can only attack alone.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME只能单独进行攻击。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·198 | Master of Cruelties | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME attacks a player and isn't blocked, that player's life total becomes 1. CARDNAME assigns no combat damage this combat.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME攻击任一牌手且未受阻挡时，该牌手的总生命成为1。CARDNAME本次战斗中不分配战斗伤害。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·199 | Mayhem Devil | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Mayhem Devil
trans-unit.target: 破坏魔鬼

trans-unit.resname: RVR·199 | Mayhem Devil | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever a player sacrifices a permanent, CARDNAME deals 1 damage to any target.
trans-unit.target: 每当任一牌手牺牲一个永久物时，CARDNAME对任意一个目标造成1点伤害。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·199 | Mayhem Devil | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Despite their stake in the city's survival, Rakdos cultists are loath to pass up any opportunity to sow chaos.
trans-unit.target: 虽然城市存亡攸关拉铎司教众生死，但他们绝不愿放过任何制造混乱的机会。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·200 | Merfolk of the Depths | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Merfolk of the Depths
trans-unit.target: 奥流人鱼

trans-unit.resname: RVR·200 | Merfolk of the Depths | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flash
trans-unit.target: 闪现

trans-unit.resname: RVR·200 | Merfolk of the Depths | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: When giant sinkholes opened across Ravnica, they revealed buried oceans and the merfolk, once thought to be extinct.
trans-unit.target: 巨大阴沟在拉尼卡各处裂开后，显露出遭埋没的海洋，以及人们一度以为已绝种的人鱼。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·201 | Mindleech Mass | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Mindleech Mass
trans-unit.target: 夺念团块

trans-unit.resname: RVR·201 | Mindleech Mass | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Trample
trans-unit.target: 践踏

trans-unit.resname: RVR·201 | Mindleech Mass | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME deals combat damage to a player, you may look at that player's hand. If you do, you may cast a spell from among those cards without paying its mana cost.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，你可以检视该牌手的手牌。若你如此作，则你可以从这些牌之中施放一个咒语，且不需支付其法术力费用。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·202 | Moroii | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Moroii
trans-unit.target: 莫洛伊

trans-unit.resname: RVR·202 | Moroii | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.resname: RVR·202 | Moroii | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 1 life.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，你失去1点生命。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·202 | Moroii | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Touched by moroii"\n—Undercity slang meaning "to grow old"
trans-unit.target: 「给莫洛伊碰上」\n～地底城俚语，意指「变老」

trans-unit.resname: RVR·203 | Mortus Strider | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Mortus Strider
trans-unit.target: 跨行亡者

trans-unit.resname: RVR·203 | Mortus Strider | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME dies, return it to its owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME死去时，将它移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·203 | Mortus Strider | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Dimir's best agents hide from death itself.
trans-unit.target: 底密尔的最佳密探连死亡都能避开。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·204 | Mourning Thrull | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Mourning Thrull
trans-unit.target: 悼亡索尔兽

trans-unit.resname: RVR·204 | Mourning Thrull | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.resname: RVR·204 | Mourning Thrull | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME deals damage, you gain that much life.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME造成伤害时，你获得等量的生命。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·204 | Mourning Thrull | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: During their ascent to spirithood, patriarchs of Orzhova shed both flesh and emotion. This earthly slag is collected and formed into thrulls.
trans-unit.target: 在灵性升华的过程中，欧佐瓦执政官的血肉与感情都消失无踪。收集这些尘俗渣滓后，就可用来塑造索尔兽。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·205 | Nicol Bolas, Dragon-God | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Nicol Bolas, Dragon-God
trans-unit.target: 龙尊尼可波拉斯

trans-unit.resname: RVR·205 | Nicol Bolas, Dragon-God | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME has all loyalty abilities of all other planeswalkers on the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME具有战场上所有其他鹏洛客的所有忠诚异能。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·205 | Nicol Bolas, Dragon-God | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: +1: You draw a card. Each opponent exiles a card from their hand or a permanent they control.
trans-unit.target: +1：你抓一张牌。每位对手各放逐一张手牌或一个由其操控的永久物。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·205 | Nicol Bolas, Dragon-God | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: −3: Destroy target creature or planeswalker.
trans-unit.target: −3：消灭目标生物或鹏洛客。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·205 | Nicol Bolas, Dragon-God | Card Text | Paragraph 4
trans-unit.source: −8: Each opponent who doesn't control a legendary creature or planeswalker loses the game.
trans-unit.target: −8：每位未操控传奇生物或传奇鹏洛客的对手各输掉这盘游戏。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·206 | Nightveil Predator | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Nightveil Predator
trans-unit.target: 夜篷掠食者

trans-unit.resname: RVR·206 | Nightveil Predator | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying, deathtouch
trans-unit.target: 飞行，死触

trans-unit.resname: RVR·206 | Nightveil Predator | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
trans-unit.target: 辟邪（此生物不能成为由对手操控之咒语或异能的目标。）

trans-unit.resname: RVR·206 | Nightveil Predator | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Three daggers left in an angel's back, three enforcers with memory loss, three keys stolen from my own belt—and you talk of peace?"\n—Tajic, to Aurelia
trans-unit.target: 「天使的背上插着三把匕首，三名执法者的记忆缺漏，本人的腰带上有三把钥匙被偷～这时跟我谈和平？」\n～塔疾克质问欧瑞梨

trans-unit.resname: RVR·207 | Niv-Mizzet, Parun | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Niv-Mizzet, Parun
trans-unit.target: 元祖尼米捷

trans-unit.resname: RVR·207 | Niv-Mizzet, Parun | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: This spell can't be countered.
trans-unit.target: 此咒语不能被反击。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·207 | Niv-Mizzet, Parun | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.resname: RVR·207 | Niv-Mizzet, Parun | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Whenever you draw a card, CARDNAME deals 1 damage to any target.
trans-unit.target: 每当你抓一张牌时，CARDNAME对任意一个目标造成1点伤害。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·207 | Niv-Mizzet, Parun | Card Text | Paragraph 4
trans-unit.source: Whenever a player casts an instant or sorcery spell, you draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 每当任一牌手施放瞬间或法术咒语时，你抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·208 | Orzhov Guildmage | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Orzhov Guildmage
trans-unit.target: 欧佐夫公会法师

trans-unit.resname: RVR·208 | Orzhov Guildmage | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {2}{W}: Target player gains 1 life.
trans-unit.target: {2}{W}：目标牌手获得1点生命。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·208 | Orzhov Guildmage | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {2}{B}: Each player loses 1 life.
trans-unit.target: {2}{B}：每位牌手失去1点生命。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·209 | Petrahydrox | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Petrahydrox
trans-unit.target: 石水融怪

trans-unit.resname: RVR·209 | Petrahydrox | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME becomes the target of a spell or ability, return CARDNAME to its owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME成为咒语或异能的目标时，将CARDNAME移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·209 | Petrahydrox | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: It departs through the streets' fissures with a sound like gravel pouring into a pond.
trans-unit.target: 它从城市的裂缝现身，声响有如砾石倾入池塘。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·210 | Phytohydra | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Phytohydra
trans-unit.target: 繁生多头龙

trans-unit.resname: RVR·210 | Phytohydra | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: If damage would be dealt to CARDNAME, put that many +1/+1 counters on it instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果CARDNAME将受到伤害，则改为在其上放置等量的+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·210 | Phytohydra | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Look at this creature, so like the Conclave it serves. Cut one head and it grows two. Damage it and it flourishes."\n—Veszka, Selesnya evangel
trans-unit.target: 「瞧瞧这东西，它与所效命的盟会有多么相似：砍掉一个头，就长出两个；试图打击它，却只让它更加茁壮。」\n～瑟雷尼亚福音师薇兹卡

trans-unit.resname: RVR·211 | Prime Speaker Zegana | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Prime Speaker Zegana
trans-unit.target: 首席洁加娜

trans-unit.resname: RVR·211 | Prime Speaker Zegana | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it, where X is the greatest power among other creatures you control.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME进战场时上面有X个+1/+1指示物，X为由你操控的其他生物中力量最大者的数值。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·211 | Prime Speaker Zegana | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, draw cards equal to its power.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，抓等同于其力量的牌。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·212 | Putrefy | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Putrefy
trans-unit.target: 腐烂

trans-unit.resname: RVR·212 | Putrefy | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Destroy target artifact or creature. It can't be regenerated.
trans-unit.target: 消灭目标神器或生物。它不能重生。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·212 | Putrefy | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "All matter, animate or not, rots when exposed to time. We merely speed up the process."\n—Ezoc, Golgari rot farmer
trans-unit.target: 「不论是否复生之物，所有东西都会随时间推移而腐朽。我们只是让过程加速而已。」\n～葛加理腐尸农夫伊作

trans-unit.resname: RVR·213 | Rakdos Firewheeler | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Rakdos Firewheeler
trans-unit.target: 拉铎司火轮师

trans-unit.resname: RVR·213 | Rakdos Firewheeler | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, it deals 2 damage to target opponent and 2 damage to up to one target creature or planeswalker.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，它向目标对手造成2点伤害，且对至多一个目标生物或鹏洛客造成2点伤害。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·213 | Rakdos Firewheeler | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Ever wonder why you never see an old Rakdos cultist?
trans-unit.target: 有没有想过为什么从来没见过年长的拉铎司教徒？

trans-unit.resname: RVR·214 | Rakdos Guildmage | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Rakdos Guildmage
trans-unit.target: 拉铎司公会法师

trans-unit.resname: RVR·214 | Rakdos Guildmage | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {3}{B}, Discard a card: Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: {3}{B}，弃一张牌：目标生物得-2/-2直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·214 | Rakdos Guildmage | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {3}{R}: Create a 2/1 red Goblin creature token with haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step.
trans-unit.target: {3}{R}：派出一个2/1红色，具敏捷异能的鬼怪衍生生物。在下一个结束步骤开始时将它放逐。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·215 | Rakdos, Lord of Riots | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Rakdos, Lord of Riots
trans-unit.target: 暴动之王拉铎司

trans-unit.resname: RVR·215 | Rakdos, Lord of Riots | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: You can't cast this spell unless an opponent lost life this turn.
trans-unit.target: 除非本回合中有对手失去过生命，否则你不能施放此咒语。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·215 | Rakdos, Lord of Riots | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Flying, trample
trans-unit.target: 飞行，践踏

trans-unit.resname: RVR·215 | Rakdos, Lord of Riots | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Creature spells you cast cost {1} less to cast for each 1 life your opponents have lost this turn.
trans-unit.target: 所有对手本回合中每失去过1点生命，你施放的生物咒语便减少{1}来施放。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·216 | Ral Zarek | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Ral Zarek
trans-unit.target: 拉尔查雷克

trans-unit.resname: RVR·216 | Ral Zarek | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: +1: Tap target permanent, then untap another target permanent.
trans-unit.target: +1：横置目标永久物，然后重置另一个目标永久物。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·216 | Ral Zarek | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: −2: CARDNAME deals 3 damage to any target.
trans-unit.target: −2：CARDNAME对任意一个目标造成3点伤害。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·216 | Ral Zarek | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: −7: Flip five coins. Take an extra turn after this one for each coin that comes up heads.
trans-unit.target: −7：掷五枚硬币。每有一枚硬币掷出正面，便在本回合后进行额外的一个回合。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·217 | Rhythm of the Wild | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Rhythm of the Wild
trans-unit.target: 荒野韵律

trans-unit.resname: RVR·217 | Rhythm of the Wild | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Creature spells you control can't be countered.
trans-unit.target: 由你操控的生物咒语不能被反击。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·217 | Rhythm of the Wild | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Nontoken creatures you control have riot. (They enter the battlefield with your choice of a +1/+1 counter or haste.)
trans-unit.target: 由你操控且非衍生物的生物具有起事异能。（于这类生物进战场时，你选择「+1/+1指示物」或「敏捷」。它们进战场时上面有所选加成。）

trans-unit.resname: RVR·217 | Rhythm of the Wild | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Some view Domri's unlikely ascent as a sign of Ilharg the Raze-Boar's imminent return.
trans-unit.target: 有人觉得多密的意外崛起是蛮野猪神衣哈格即将回归的征兆。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·218 | Savra, Queen of the Golgari | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Savra, Queen of the Golgari
trans-unit.target: 葛加理女王撒芙儿

trans-unit.resname: RVR·218 | Savra, Queen of the Golgari | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever you sacrifice a black creature, you may pay 2 life. If you do, each other player sacrifices a creature.
trans-unit.target: 每当你牺牲一个黑色生物时，你可以支付2点生命。若你如此作，则每位其他牌手各牺牲一个生物。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·218 | Savra, Queen of the Golgari | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever you sacrifice a green creature, you may gain 2 life.
trans-unit.target: 每当你牺牲一个绿色生物时，你可以获得2点生命。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·218 | Savra, Queen of the Golgari | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Nature's most raw beauty is the circle: perfect in its continuance, with no break between death and life."
trans-unit.target: 「大自然最纯粹的美，就是完美的生息循环：在生死之间永无停歇。」

trans-unit.resname: RVR·219 | Scab-Clan Mauler | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Scab-Clan Mauler
trans-unit.target: 司凯族虐杀兵

trans-unit.resname: RVR·219 | Scab-Clan Mauler | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Bloodthirst 2 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.)
trans-unit.target: 嗜血2（如果对手本回合中受过伤害，则此生物进战场时上面有两个+1/+1指示物。）

trans-unit.resname: RVR·219 | Scab-Clan Mauler | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Trample
trans-unit.target: 践踏

trans-unit.resname: RVR·219 | Scab-Clan Mauler | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: They inflict pain to forget their own and break foes to feel whole.
trans-unit.target: 他们靠着伤人来忘记自身疼痛，扯裂敌人来感觉自身健全。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·220 | Selesnya Evangel | Card Name

trans-unit.resname: RVR·248 | Assemble | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Create three 2/2 green and white Elf Knight creature tokens with vigilance.
trans-unit.target: 派出三个2/2，绿白双色，具警戒异能的妖精／骑士衍生生物。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·249 | Repudiate | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Repudiate
trans-unit.target: 复除

trans-unit.resname: RVR·249 | Repudiate | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Counter target activated or triggered ability. (Mana abilities can't be targeted.)
trans-unit.target: 反击目标起动式或触发式异能。（其目标不能是法术力异能。）

trans-unit.resname: RVR·249 | Replicate | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Replicate
trans-unit.target: 复制

trans-unit.resname: RVR·249 | Replicate | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Create a token that's a copy of target creature you control.
trans-unit.target: 派出一个衍生物，此衍生物为目标由你操控的生物之CARDNAME品。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·250 | Azorius Signet | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Azorius Signet
trans-unit.target: 俄佐立印记

trans-unit.resname: RVR·250 | Azorius Signet | Card Text | Paragraph 1
RVR·250 | Azorius Signet | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The maze-like design embodies the core of Azorius law—strict structure designed to test wills and stall change.
trans-unit.target: 这迷宫般的设计具现了俄佐立法律的核心精神～用来试练意志、延缓变化的精密结构。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·251 | Boros Signet | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Boros Signet
trans-unit.target: 波洛斯印记

trans-unit.resname: RVR·251 | Boros Signet | Card Text | Paragraph 1
RVR·251 | Boros Signet | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Have you ever held a Boros signet? There's a weight to it that belies its size—a weight of strength and of pride."\n—Agrus Kos
trans-unit.target: 「你有没有用手捧过波洛斯印记？这印记比外表看起来要沉重许多～因为它承载了厚实的力量与荣耀。」\n～阿固寇斯

trans-unit.resname: RVR·252 | Bottled Cloister | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Bottled Cloister
trans-unit.target: 瓶封隐居地

trans-unit.resname: RVR·252 | Bottled Cloister | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, exile all cards from your hand face down.
trans-unit.target: 在每位对手的维持开始时，牌面朝下地放逐你手上的所有牌。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·252 | Bottled Cloister | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, return all cards you own exiled with CARDNAME to your hand, then draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，将所有以CARDNAME放逐的牌移回你手上，然后抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·253 | Chromatic Lantern | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Chromatic Lantern
trans-unit.target: 五彩宫灯

trans-unit.resname: RVR·253 | Chromatic Lantern | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Lands you control have "{T}: Add one mana of any color."
trans-unit.target: 由你操控的地具有「{T}：加一点任意颜色的法术力。」

trans-unit.resname: RVR·253 | Chromatic Lantern | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add one mana of any color.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加一点任意颜色的法术力。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·253 | Chromatic Lantern | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Dimir mages put the lanterns to good use, creating shapeshifters and sleeper agents from mana foreign to them.
trans-unit.target: 底密尔法师充分利用宫灯，从他们不熟悉的法术力当中制造出变形兽和潜藏密探。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·254 | Civic Saber | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Civic Saber
trans-unit.target: 市民配刀

trans-unit.resname: RVR·254 | Civic Saber | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Equipped creature gets +1/+0 for each of its colors.
trans-unit.target: 佩带此武具的生物每有一种颜色，便得+1/+0。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·254 | Civic Saber | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Equip {1}
trans-unit.target: 佩带{1}

trans-unit.resname: RVR·254 | Civic Saber | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Those without a guild signet often display a different form of protection.
trans-unit.target: 对未佩戴公会印记的人而言，其外在的保护形式往往有所不同。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·255 | Cloudstone Curio | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Cloudstone Curio
trans-unit.target: 云石古物

trans-unit.resname: RVR·255 | Cloudstone Curio | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever a nonartifact permanent enters the battlefield under your control, you may return another permanent you control that shares a permanent type with it to its owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个非神器永久物在你操控下进战场时，你可以将另一个由你操控且与之具共通永久物类别的永久物移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·255 | Cloudstone Curio | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: It *wants* to remain a mystery, banishing the curious in favor of less inquisitive company.
trans-unit.target: 它意欲保持神秘，将好奇者全部放逐，只与不爱追根究底者为伴。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·256 | Dimir Signet | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Dimir Signet
trans-unit.target: 底密尔印记

trans-unit.resname: RVR·256 | Dimir Signet | Card Text | Paragraph 1
RVR·256 | Dimir Signet | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: An emblem of a secret guild, the Dimir insignia is seen only by its own members—and the doomed.
trans-unit.target: 秘密存在的底密尔公会，其徽记没有外人见过～除了手底亡魂之外。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·257 | Gate Colossus | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Gate Colossus
trans-unit.target: 城门巨像

trans-unit.resname: RVR·257 | Gate Colossus | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: This spell costs {1} less to cast for each Gate you control.
trans-unit.target: 你每操控一个门，此咒语便减少{1}来施放。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·257 | Gate Colossus | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME不能被力量等于或小于2的生物阻挡。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·257 | Gate Colossus | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Whenever a Gate enters the battlefield under your control, you may put CARDNAME from your graveyard on top of your library.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个门在你操控下进战场时，你可以将CARDNAME从你的坟墓场置于你的牌库顶。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·258 | Golgari Signet | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Golgari Signet
trans-unit.target: 葛加理印记

trans-unit.resname: RVR·258 | Golgari Signet | Card Text | Paragraph 1
RVR·258 | Golgari Signet | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Depending on your point of view, the seal represents a proud guardian of the natural cycle or one who has sold her soul to darkness for eternal life.
trans-unit.target: 这徽记的意义随你观点不同而变化：可能是足以自傲的自然循环护卫，也可能是向黑暗出卖灵魂以求永生的恶徒。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·259 | Gruul Signet | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Gruul Signet
trans-unit.target: 古鲁印记

trans-unit.resname: RVR·259 | Gruul Signet | Card Text | Paragraph 1
RVR·259 | Gruul Signet | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Gruul territorial markings need not be legible. The blood, snot, and muck used to smear them are unmistakably Gruul.
trans-unit.target: 古鲁的地界标志不需要刻意清楚标示。看到用鲜血，鼻涕，或粪便涂抹的痕迹，就晓得这边属于古鲁。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·260 | Illusionist's Bracers | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Illusionist's Bracers
trans-unit.target: 幻影师护臂

trans-unit.resname: RVR·260 | Illusionist's Bracers | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever an ability of equipped creature is activated, if it isn't a mana ability, copy that ability. You may choose new targets for the copy.
trans-unit.target: 每当起动佩带此武具之生物的异能时，若它不是法术力异能，则复制该异能。你可以为该复制品选择新的目标。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·260 | Illusionist's Bracers | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Equip {3}
trans-unit.target: 佩带{3}

trans-unit.resname: RVR·260 | Illusionist's Bracers | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: It's easy to believe you're a god when you're twice as powerful as everyone else.
trans-unit.target: 如果你比其他人强两倍，就很容易被当成神。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·261 | Izzet Signet | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Izzet Signet
trans-unit.target: 伊捷印记

trans-unit.resname: RVR·261 | Izzet Signet | Card Text | Paragraph 1
RVR·261 | Izzet Signet | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The Izzet signet is redesigned often, each time becoming closer to a vanity portrait of Niv-Mizzet.
trans-unit.target: 伊捷印记的设计经常变化，每次都更接近尼米捷浮华的画像。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·262 | Junktroller | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Junktroller
trans-unit.target: 垃圾回收机

trans-unit.resname: RVR·262 | Junktroller | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Defender
trans-unit.target: 守军

trans-unit.resname: RVR·262 | Junktroller | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {T}: Put target card from a graveyard on the bottom of its owner's library.
trans-unit.target: {T}：将目标牌从任一坟墓场置于其拥有者的牌库底。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·262 | Junktroller | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: One man's trash is another man's troller.
trans-unit.target: 某人的垃圾，可能是别人的回收机。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·263 | Orzhov Signet | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Orzhov Signet
trans-unit.target: 欧佐夫印记

trans-unit.resname: RVR·263 | Orzhov Signet | Card Text | Paragraph 1
RVR·263 | Orzhov Signet | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The sigil holds different meanings depending on its form and presentation. While some wear it as a sign of status, others wear it as a sign of debt.
trans-unit.target: 此印记外观样式与佩戴形式不同，其代表涵义也大不一样。有人将其作为地位的象征，而有人则视为负债的标志。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·264 | Pariah's Shield | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Pariah's Shield
trans-unit.target: 贱民之盾

trans-unit.resname: RVR·264 | Pariah's Shield | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: All damage that would be dealt to you is dealt to equipped creature instead.
trans-unit.target: 将对你造成的所有伤害改为对佩带此武具的生物造成之。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·264 | Pariah's Shield | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Equip {3}
trans-unit.target: 佩带{3}

trans-unit.resname: RVR·264 | Pariah's Shield | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: To bear the shield of the pariah is the highest honor a Boros can receive—and the last.
trans-unit.target: 身负此盾乃为波洛斯最高的荣誉～也是最后的荣誉。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·265 | Rakdos Signet | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Rakdos Signet
trans-unit.target: 拉铎司印记

trans-unit.resname: RVR·265 | Rakdos Signet | Card Text | Paragraph 1
RVR·265 | Rakdos Signet | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Made of bone and boiled in blood, a Rakdos signet is not considered finished until it has been used as a murder weapon.
trans-unit.target: 拉铎司印记以白骨制成，要拿鲜血煮过，并且用来杀生之后才能算是大功告成。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·266 | Seal of the Guildpact | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Seal of the Guildpact
trans-unit.target: 十会盟印

trans-unit.resname: RVR·266 | Seal of the Guildpact | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: As CARDNAME enters the battlefield, choose two colors.
trans-unit.target: 于CARDNAME进战场时，选择两种颜色。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·266 | Seal of the Guildpact | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Each spell you cast costs {1} less to cast for each of the chosen colors it is.
trans-unit.target: 对你施放的咒语而言，该咒语每有一种所选颜色，便减少{1}来施放。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·266 | Seal of the Guildpact | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "I'd rather see the guilds contend together with words in the halls of power, than in the streets with swords."\n—Jace Beleren
trans-unit.target: 「我宁愿看着公会在权力大厅上斗嘴，也不愿见到街头动武。」\n～杰斯贝连

trans-unit.resname: RVR·267 | Selesnya Signet | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Selesnya Signet
trans-unit.target: 瑟雷尼亚印记

trans-unit.resname: RVR·267 | Selesnya Signet | Card Text | Paragraph 1
RVR·267 | Selesnya Signet | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The symbol of the Conclave is one of unity, with tree supporting sun and sun feeding tree.
trans-unit.target: 盟会的印记象征天人合一；树木支持着太阳，太阳滋养着树木。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·268 | Silent Dart | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Silent Dart
trans-unit.target: 无声袖剑

trans-unit.resname: RVR·268 | Silent Dart | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {4}, {T}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: It deals 3 damage to target creature.
trans-unit.target: {4}，{T}，牺牲CARDNAME：它对目标生物造成3点伤害。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·268 | Silent Dart | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "These terms are acceptable to House Dimir. Shall we shake on it?"
trans-unit.target: 「底密尔会堂接受你们的条件。握个手？」

trans-unit.resname: RVR·269 | Simic Signet | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Simic Signet
trans-unit.target: 析米克印记

trans-unit.resname: RVR·269 | Simic Signet | Card Text | Paragraph 1
RVR·269 | Simic Signet | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: For the Simic Combine, its sigil serves not as an emblem of honor but as a trademark. Its familiar image on any biological commodity attests to superb craftsmanship, ingenious innovation, and higher cost.
trans-unit.target: 对析米克联合而言，其印记并非荣誉之徽记，而是注册商标。这熟悉图像在任何生体用品上都可见到，证明了为其投资的高超技巧，精妙创意，以及昂贵费用。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·270 | Sword of the Paruns | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Sword of the Paruns
trans-unit.target: 远祖之剑

trans-unit.resname: RVR·270 | Sword of the Paruns | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: As long as equipped creature is tapped, tapped creatures you control get +2/+0.
trans-unit.target: 只要佩带此武具的生物已横置，由你操控且已横置的生物便得+2/+0。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·270 | Sword of the Paruns | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: As long as equipped creature is untapped, untapped creatures you control get +0/+2.
trans-unit.target: 只要佩带此武具的生物未横置，由你操控且未横置的生物便得+0/+2。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·270 | Sword of the Paruns | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: {3}: You may tap or untap equipped creature.
trans-unit.target: {3}：你可以横置或重置佩带此武具的生物。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·270 | Sword of the Paruns | Card Text | Paragraph 4
trans-unit.source: Equip {3}
trans-unit.target: 佩带{3}

trans-unit.resname: RVR·271 | Voyager Staff | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Voyager Staff
trans-unit.target: 旅人杖

trans-unit.resname: RVR·271 | Voyager Staff | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {2}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Exile target creature. Return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.
trans-unit.target: {2}，牺牲CARDNAME：放逐目标生物。在下一个结束步骤开始时，将所放逐之牌在其拥有者的操控下移回战场。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·271 | Voyager Staff | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Voyager staffs are sought by those hoping to find an escape from the sprawling glut of Ravnica.
trans-unit.target: 厌恶漫无止境扩张的人，会寻求旅人杖以远离拉尼卡。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·272 | Azorius Guildgate | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Azorius Guildgate
trans-unit.target: 俄佐立公会门

trans-unit.resname: RVR·272 | Azorius Guildgate | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield tapped.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME须横置进战场。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·272 | Azorius Guildgate | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {W} or {U}.

trans-unit.resname: RVR·272 | Azorius Guildgate | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Enter the Senate, the seat of justice and the foundation of Ravnican society.
trans-unit.target: 此门通往参议院，拉尼卡天空下的正义础石。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·273 | Blood Crypt | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Blood Crypt
trans-unit.target: 血腥墓穴

trans-unit.resname: RVR·273 | Blood Crypt | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: ({T}: Add {B} or {R}.)

trans-unit.resname: RVR·273 | Blood Crypt | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: As CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters the battlefield tapped.
trans-unit.target: 于CARDNAME进战场时，你可以支付2点生命。如果你未如此作，则CARDNAME须横置进战场。

trans-unit.source: Boros Guildgate
trans-unit.target: 波洛斯公会门

trans-unit.resname: RVR·274 | Boros Guildgate | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield tapped.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME须横置进战场。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·274 | Boros Guildgate | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {R} or {W}.

trans-unit.resname: RVR·274 | Boros Guildgate | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Enter with merciful hearts. Exit with battle cries.
trans-unit.target: 此门前来时尚存慈悲胸怀，归去时锻出响亮战嚎。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·275 | Breeding Pool | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Breeding Pool
trans-unit.target: 滋生之池

trans-unit.resname: RVR·275 | Breeding Pool | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: ({T}: Add {G} or {U}.)

trans-unit.resname: RVR·275 | Breeding Pool | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: As CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters the battlefield tapped.
trans-unit.target: 于CARDNAME进战场时，你可以支付2点生命。如果你未如此作，则CARDNAME须横置进战场。

trans-unit.source: Dimir Guildgate
trans-unit.target: 底密尔公会门

trans-unit.resname: RVR·276 | Dimir Guildgate | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield tapped.

trans-unit.source: Enter and become a mastermind of spies, lies, and deception.
trans-unit.target: 此门将助有志者成为谍报、谎言和欺骗大师。

trans-unit.source: Godless Shrine
trans-unit.target: 无神祭祠

trans-unit.resname: RVR·277 | Godless Shrine | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: ({T}: Add {W} or {B}.)

trans-unit.resname: RVR·277 | Godless Shrine | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: As CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters the battlefield tapped.
trans-unit.target: 于CARDNAME进战场时，你可以支付2点生命。如果你未如此作，则CARDNAME须横置进战场。

trans-unit.source: Golgari Guildgate
trans-unit.target: 葛加理公会门

trans-unit.resname: RVR·278 | Golgari Guildgate | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield tapped.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME须横置进战场。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·278 | Golgari Guildgate | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {B} or {G}.

trans-unit.source: Enter those who are starving and sick. You are welcome among the Swarm when the rest of Ravnica rejects you.
trans-unit.target: 此门收容饥病交迫者；即使在各公会都无处容身，群落也愿接纳。

trans-unit.source: Gruul Guildgate
trans-unit.target: 古鲁公会门

trans-unit.resname: RVR·279 | Gruul Guildgate | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield tapped.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME须横置进战场。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·279 | Gruul Guildgate | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {R} or {G}.

trans-unit.source: Enter and leave the shackles of society behind.
trans-unit.target: 此门将所有社会枷锁一同置诸脑后。

trans-unit.source: Hallowed Fountain
trans-unit.target: 崇圣喷泉

trans-unit.resname: RVR·280 | Hallowed Fountain | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: ({T}: Add {W} or {U}.)

trans-unit.resname: RVR·280 | Hallowed Fountain | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: As CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters the battlefield tapped.
trans-unit.target: 于CARDNAME进战场时，你可以支付2点生命。如果你未如此作，则CARDNAME须横置进战场。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·281 | Izzet Guildgate | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Izzet Guildgate
trans-unit.target: 伊捷公会门

trans-unit.source: Enter those with the vision to create and the daring to release their creations.
trans-unit.target: 此门接纳拥有拉尼卡一流创意，又富实现创意的胆识者。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·282 | Orzhov Guildgate | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Enter to find wealth, security, and eternal life . . . for just a small price up front.
trans-unit.target: 此门背后藏有终身财富、安全保障和无尽永生…只要你肯先付点小钱。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·302 | Blazing Archon | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Blazing Archon
trans-unit.target: 辉光统领

trans-unit.resname: RVR·302 | Blazing Archon | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.resname: RVR·302 | Blazing Archon | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Creatures can't attack you.
trans-unit.target: 生物不能攻击你。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·302 | Blazing Archon | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Through the haze of battle I saw the glint of sun on golden mane, the sheen of glory clad in mail, and I dropped my sword and wept at the idiocy of war."\n—Dravin, Gruul deserter
trans-unit.target: 「在滚滚战尘中，我见到金色鬃毛上闪耀的阳光，荣誉之光辉披甲现身；我于是丢下了剑，为身处这愚蠢战争而流泪。」\n～古鲁叛逃者卓文

trans-unit.resname: RVR·303 | Blind Obedience | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Blind Obedience
trans-unit.target: 盲目服从

trans-unit.resname: RVR·303 | Blind Obedience | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Extort
trans-unit.target: 敲诈

trans-unit.resname: RVR·303 | Blind Obedience | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Artifacts and creatures your opponents control enter the battlefield tapped.
trans-unit.target: 由对手操控的神器与生物须横置进战场。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·303 | Blind Obedience | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "By the time your knees have worn through your robe, you may have begun to learn your place."
trans-unit.target: 「跪到长袍磨破时，你就会明白自己的地位到哪里。」

trans-unit.resname: RVR·304 | Condemn | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Condemn
trans-unit.target: 判罪

trans-unit.resname: RVR·304 | Condemn | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Put target attacking creature on the bottom of its owner's library. Its controller gains life equal to its toughness.
trans-unit.target: 将目标进行攻击的生物置于其拥有者的牌库底。其操控者获得等同于其防御力的生命。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·304 | Condemn | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "No doubt the arbiters would put you away, after all the documents are signed. But I will have justice now."\n—Alovnek, Boros guildmage
trans-unit.target: 「既然需签署的文件一无遗漏，仲裁者当然会放过你。但我现在就要主持正义！」\n～波洛斯公会法师阿劳涅

trans-unit.resname: RVR·305 | Devouring Light | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Devouring Light
trans-unit.target: 明光吞噬

trans-unit.resname: RVR·305 | Devouring Light | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Convoke
trans-unit.target: 召集

trans-unit.resname: RVR·305 | Devouring Light | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Exile target attacking or blocking creature.
trans-unit.target: 放逐目标进行攻击或阻挡的生物。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·305 | Devouring Light | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Into the light the good are welcomed, and with the light the evil are banished.
trans-unit.target: 明光将包容善者、放逐恶徒。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·306 | Divine Visitation | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Divine Visitation
trans-unit.target: 神恩天降

trans-unit.resname: RVR·306 | Divine Visitation | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: If one or more creature tokens would be created under your control, that many 4/4 white Angel creature tokens with flying and vigilance are created instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果将在你操控下派出一个或数个衍生生物，则改为派出等量的4/4白色，具飞行与警戒异能的天使衍生生物。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·307 | Faith's Fetters | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Faith's Fetters
trans-unit.target: 信念拘锁

trans-unit.resname: RVR·307 | Faith's Fetters | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Enchant permanent
trans-unit.target: 结附于永久物

trans-unit.resname: RVR·307 | Faith's Fetters | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you gain 4 life.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，你获得4点生命。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·307 | Faith's Fetters | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Enchanted permanent can't attack or block, and its activated abilities can't be activated unless they're mana abilities.
trans-unit.target: 所结附的永久物不能进行攻击或阻挡，且除了法术力异能之外，其起动式异能也不能起动。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·308 | Ghostway | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Ghostway
trans-unit.target: 鬼影密径

trans-unit.resname: RVR·308 | Ghostway | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Exile each creature you control. Return those cards to the battlefield under their owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.
trans-unit.target: 放逐所有由你操控的生物。在下一个结束步骤开始时，将这些牌在其拥有者的操控下移回战场。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·308 | Ghostway | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "I watched its blade swing through me, but I was hollow, empty. I saw its face contort in rage but could not hear it snarl."\n—Klattic, Boros legionnaire
trans-unit.target: 「我看着剑锋扫过，但自己的身体却是一片空无。我看着对方扭曲的愤怒面孔，却听不到他的叫骂。」\n～波洛斯军团兵喀拉提

trans-unit.resname: RVR·309 | Bruvac the Grandiloquent | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Bruvac the Grandiloquent
trans-unit.target: 浮夸的布鲁瓦

trans-unit.resname: RVR·309 | Bruvac the Grandiloquent | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: If an opponent would mill one or more cards, they mill twice that many cards instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果某对手将磨一张或数张牌，则改为其磨该数量两倍的牌。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·309 | Bruvac the Grandiloquent | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: ". . . and furthermore . . ."

trans-unit.resname: RVR·310 | Cloudfin Raptor | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Cloudfin Raptor
trans-unit.target: 云鳍掠食者

trans-unit.resname: RVR·310 | Cloudfin Raptor | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.resname: RVR·310 | Cloudfin Raptor | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Evolve
trans-unit.target: 进化

trans-unit.resname: RVR·311 | Compulsive Research | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Compulsive Research
trans-unit.target: 强制探寻

trans-unit.resname: RVR·311 | Compulsive Research | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Target player draws three cards. Then that player discards two cards unless they discard a land card.
trans-unit.target: 目标牌手抓三张牌。然后除非该牌手弃一张地牌，否则其弃两张牌。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·311 | Compulsive Research | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Four parts molten bronze, yes . . . one part frozen mercury, yes, yes . . . but then what?"
trans-unit.target: 「四份融解青铜，有了…一份冰冻水银，有了，有了…还需要什么？」

trans-unit.resname: RVR·312 | Copy Enchantment | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Copy Enchantment
trans-unit.target: 复制结界

trans-unit.resname: RVR·312 | Copy Enchantment | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: You may have CARDNAME enter the battlefield as a copy of any enchantment on the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使CARDNAME当成战场上任一结界的复制品来进入战场。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·312 | Copy Enchantment | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Simic mages create redundant backups of their experiments to reduce the consequences of catastrophe.
trans-unit.target: 析米克法师总会多次备份实验品，以提防灾祸降临。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·313 | Cyclonic Rift | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Cyclonic Rift
trans-unit.target: 龙卷裂空

trans-unit.resname: RVR·313 | Cyclonic Rift | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Return target nonland permanent you don't control to its owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: 将目标不由你操控的非地永久物移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·313 | Cyclonic Rift | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Overload {6}{U}

trans-unit.resname: RVR·313 | Cyclonic Rift | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The Izzet specialize in unnatural disaster.
trans-unit.target: 伊捷以非天然灾害为业。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·314 | Drift of Phantasms | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Drift of Phantasms
trans-unit.target: 飘移幻象

trans-unit.resname: RVR·314 | Drift of Phantasms | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Defender, flying
trans-unit.target: 守军，飞行

trans-unit.resname: RVR·314 | Drift of Phantasms | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Transmute {1}{U}{U}

trans-unit.resname: RVR·315 | Muddle the Mixture | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Muddle the Mixture
trans-unit.target: 弄混配方

trans-unit.resname: RVR·315 | Muddle the Mixture | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Counter target instant or sorcery spell.
trans-unit.target: 反击目标瞬间或法术咒语。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·315 | Muddle the Mixture | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Transmute {1}{U}{U}

trans-unit.resname: RVR·316 | Persistent Petitioners | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Persistent Petitioners
trans-unit.target: 执着诉愿人

trans-unit.resname: RVR·316 | Persistent Petitioners | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {1}, {T}: Target player mills a card.\nTap four untapped Advisors you control: Target player mills twelve cards.\nA deck can have any number of cards named CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target:
{1}，{T}：目标牌手磨一张牌。

横置四个由你操控且未横置的参谋：目标牌手磨十二张牌。
名称为CARDNAME的牌，在套牌中的数量不受限制。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·317 | Pteramander | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Pteramander
trans-unit.target: 翼蜥

trans-unit.resname: RVR·317 | Pteramander | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.resname: RVR·317 | Pteramander | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {7}{U}: Adapt 4. This ability costs {1} less to activate for each instant and sorcery card in your graveyard.
trans-unit.target: {7}{U}：演化4。你坟墓场中每有一张瞬间与法术牌，此异能便减少{1}来起动。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·318 | Quicken | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Quicken
trans-unit.target: 加快

trans-unit.resname: RVR·318 | Quicken | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: The next sorcery spell you cast this turn can be cast as though it had flash.
trans-unit.target: 你本回合中施放的下一个法术咒语能视同具有闪现异能地来施放。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·318 | Quicken | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·318 | Quicken | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: A skilled Izzet chronarch can carry out an epic vendetta between the fall of one hourglass grain and the next.

trans-unit.resname: RVR·349 | Guardian Project | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever a nontoken creature enters the battlefield under your control, if it doesn't have the same name as another creature you control or a creature card in your graveyard, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个非衍生物的生物在你操控下进战场时，若它与由你操控的其他生物和你坟墓场中的生物牌都不同名，则抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·349 | Guardian Project | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Simic's strength comes from its diversity.
trans-unit.target: 析米克的力量源自于其多元物种。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·351 | Loaming Shaman | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: His work determines who is remembered and who feeds the worms.
trans-unit.target: 他的工作能决定谁会留名，谁会留给虫。

trans-unit.target: 腐烂

trans-unit.resname: RVR·378 | Putrefy | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Destroy target artifact or creature. It can't be regenerated.
trans-unit.target: 消灭目标神器或生物。它不能重生。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·378 | Putrefy | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "All matter, animate or not, rots when exposed to time. We merely speed up the process."\n—Ezoc, Golgari rot farmer
trans-unit.target: 「不论是否复生之物，所有东西都会随时间推移而腐朽。我们只是让过程加速而已。」\n～葛加理腐尸农夫伊作

trans-unit.resname: RVR·379 | Rakdos, Lord of Riots | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Rakdos, Lord of Riots
trans-unit.target: 暴动之王拉铎司

trans-unit.resname: RVR·379 | Rakdos, Lord of Riots | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: You can't cast this spell unless an opponent lost life this turn.
trans-unit.target: 除非本回合中有对手失去过生命，否则你不能施放此咒语。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·379 | Rakdos, Lord of Riots | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Flying, trample
trans-unit.target: 飞行，践踏

trans-unit.resname: RVR·379 | Rakdos, Lord of Riots | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Creature spells you cast cost {1} less to cast for each 1 life your opponents have lost this turn.
trans-unit.target: 所有对手本回合中每失去过1点生命，你施放的生物咒语便减少{1}来施放。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·380 | Rhythm of the Wild | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Rhythm of the Wild
trans-unit.target: 荒野韵律

trans-unit.resname: RVR·380 | Rhythm of the Wild | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Creature spells you control can't be countered.
trans-unit.target: 由你操控的生物咒语不能被反击。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·380 | Rhythm of the Wild | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Nontoken creatures you control have riot.
trans-unit.target: 由你操控且非衍生物的生物具有起事异能。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·380 | Rhythm of the Wild | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Some view Domri's unlikely ascent as a sign of Ilharg the Raze-Boar's imminent return.
trans-unit.target: 有人觉得多密的意外崛起是蛮野猪神衣哈格即将回归的征兆。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·381 | Savra, Queen of the Golgari | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Savra, Queen of the Golgari
trans-unit.target: 葛加理女王撒芙儿

trans-unit.resname: RVR·381 | Savra, Queen of the Golgari | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever you sacrifice a black creature, you may pay 2 life. If you do, each other player sacrifices a creature.
trans-unit.target: 每当你牺牲一个黑色生物时，你可以支付2点生命。若你如此作，则每位其他牌手各牺牲一个生物。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·381 | Savra, Queen of the Golgari | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever you sacrifice a green creature, you may gain 2 life.
trans-unit.target: 每当你牺牲一个绿色生物时，你可以获得2点生命。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·381 | Savra, Queen of the Golgari | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Nature's most raw beauty is the circle: perfect in its continuance, with no break between death and life."
trans-unit.target: 「大自然最纯粹的美，就是完美的生息循环：在生死之间永无停歇。」

trans-unit.resname: RVR·382 | Sky Hussar | Card Text | Paragraph 3

trans-unit.resname: RVR·388 | Voidslime | Flavor Text

trans-unit.resname: RVR·391 | Cloudstone Curio | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: It *wants* to remain a mystery, banishing the curious in favor of less inquisitive company.

trans-unit.source: It's easy to believe you're a god when you're twice as powerful as everyone else.
