trans-unit.target: 每当一个非神器永久物在你操控下进战场时，你可以将另一个由你操控且与之具共通永久物类别的永久物移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·444 | Domri Rade | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Domri Rade
trans-unit.target: 多密雷德

trans-unit.resname: RVR·444 | Domri Rade | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: +1: Look at the top card of your library. If it's a creature card, you may reveal it and put it into your hand.
trans-unit.target: +1：检视你的牌库顶牌。如果它是生物牌，则你可以展示该牌并置于你手上。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·444 | Domri Rade | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: −2: Target creature you control fights another target creature.
trans-unit.target: −2：目标由你操控的生物与另一个目标生物互斗。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·444 | Domri Rade | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: −7: You get an emblem with "Creatures you control have double strike, trample, hexproof, and haste."
trans-unit.target: −7：你获得具有以下异能的徽记～「由你操控的生物具有连击、践踏、辟邪与敏捷异能。」

trans-unit.resname: RVR·445 | Ral Zarek | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Ral Zarek
trans-unit.target: 拉尔查雷克

trans-unit.resname: RVR·445 | Ral Zarek | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: +1: Tap target permanent, then untap another target permanent.
trans-unit.target: +1：横置目标永久物，然后重置另一个目标永久物。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·445 | Ral Zarek | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: −2: CARDNAME deals 3 damage to any target.
trans-unit.target: −2：CARDNAME对任意一个目标造成3点伤害。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·445 | Ral Zarek | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: −7: Flip five coins. Take an extra turn after this one for each coin that comes up heads.
trans-unit.target: −7：掷五枚硬币。每有一枚硬币掷出正面，便在本回合后进行额外的一个回合。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·446 | Rest in Peace | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Rest in Peace
trans-unit.target: 得享安息

trans-unit.resname: RVR·446 | Rest in Peace | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, exile all graveyards.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，放逐所有坟墓场。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·446 | Rest in Peace | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: If a card or token would be put into a graveyard from anywhere, exile it instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果某牌或衍生物将从任何区域进入坟墓场，则改为将它放逐。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·446 | Rest in Peace | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Some corpses the Golgari cannot claim. Some souls the Orzhov cannot shackle.
trans-unit.target: 有些尸骸葛加理无法夺取。有些灵魂欧佐夫无法束缚。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·447 | Sphere of Safety | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Sphere of Safety
trans-unit.target: 安全球罩

trans-unit.resname: RVR·447 | Sphere of Safety | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Creatures can't attack you or planeswalkers you control unless their controller pays {X} for each of those creatures, where X is the number of enchantments you control.
trans-unit.target: 对每个生物而言，除非其操控者为其支付{X}，否则它不能攻击你或由你操控的鹏洛客，X为由你操控的结界数量。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·447 | Sphere of Safety | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The Rakdos believe that all are eager to join their revels, even when told otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 拉铎司教派相信所有人都渴望加入其欢宴，就算口头拒绝者也只是言不由衷。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·448 | Aetherize | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Aetherize
trans-unit.target: 乙太化

trans-unit.resname: RVR·448 | Aetherize | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Return all attacking creatures to their owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: 将所有进行攻击的生物移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·448 | Aetherize | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "You can come back once you've learned some manners—and figured out how to reconstitute your physical forms."
trans-unit.target: 「等你学会礼貌，想出如何重构你的形体后就可以回来。」

trans-unit.resname: RVR·449 | Enter the Infinite | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Enter the Infinite
trans-unit.target: 迈入永恒

trans-unit.resname: RVR·449 | Enter the Infinite | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Draw cards equal to the number of cards in your library, then put a card from your hand on top of your library. You have no maximum hand size until your next turn.
trans-unit.target: 抓若干牌，其数量等同于你牌库中牌的数量，然后将一张牌从你手上置于你的牌库顶。直到你的下一个回合，你的手牌数量没有上限。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·449 | Enter the Infinite | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: There is no knowledge that is not power.
trans-unit.target: 知识必是力量。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·450 | Gigantoplasm | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Gigantoplasm
trans-unit.target: 庞巨原生质

trans-unit.resname: RVR·450 | Gigantoplasm | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: You may have CARDNAME enter the battlefield as a copy of any creature on the battlefield, except it has "{X}: This creature has base power and toughness X/X."
trans-unit.target: 你可以使CARDNAME当成战场上任一生物的复制品来进入战场，但它具有「{X}：此生物的基础力量与防御力为X/X。」

trans-unit.resname: RVR·450 | Gigantoplasm | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "I appreciate things that exceed expectations."\n—Mizzix
trans-unit.target: 「我喜欢远超期望的东西。」\n～米捷兹

trans-unit.resname: RVR·451 | Narcomoeba | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Narcomoeba
trans-unit.target: 梦生阿米巴

trans-unit.resname: RVR·451 | Narcomoeba | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.resname: RVR·451 | Narcomoeba | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME is put into your graveyard from your library, you may put it onto the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME从你的牌库进入你坟墓场时，你可以将它放进战场。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·451 | Narcomoeba | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "What bait do you cast to catch a dream?"\n—Ravnican riddle
trans-unit.target: 「捕梦该投什么饵？」\n～拉尼卡谜语

trans-unit.resname: RVR·452 | Turnabout | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Turnabout
trans-unit.target: 变节

trans-unit.resname: RVR·452 | Turnabout | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Choose artifact, creature, or land. Tap all untapped permanents of the chosen type target player controls, or untap all tapped permanents of that type that player controls.
trans-unit.target: 选择神器，生物或地。横置由目标牌手操控之所有未横置的该类别永久物，或重置由该牌手操控之所有已横置的该类别永久物。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·453 | Creeping Chill | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Creeping Chill
trans-unit.target: 寒意蔓延

trans-unit.resname: RVR·453 | Creeping Chill | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME deals 3 damage to each opponent and you gain 3 life.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME向每位对手各造成3点伤害且你获得3点生命。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·453 | Creeping Chill | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME is put into your graveyard from your library, you may exile it. If you do, CARDNAME deals 3 damage to each opponent and you gain 3 life.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME从你的牌库进入你坟墓场时，你可以将它放逐。若你如此作，则CARDNAME向每位对手各造成3点伤害且你获得3点生命。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·454 | Darkblast | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Darkblast
trans-unit.target: 黑暗冲击波

trans-unit.resname: RVR·454 | Darkblast | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 目标生物得-1/-1直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·454 | Darkblast | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Dredge 3
trans-unit.target: 发掘3

trans-unit.resname: RVR·455 | Pack Rat | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Pack Rat
trans-unit.target: 林鼠群

trans-unit.resname: RVR·455 | Pack Rat | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Rats you control.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME的力量和防御力各等同于由你操控的老鼠数量。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·455 | Pack Rat | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {2}{B}, Discard a card: Create a token that's a copy of CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: {2}{B}，弃一张牌：派出一个衍生物，此衍生物为CARDNAME的复制品。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·456 | Shattering Spree | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Shattering Spree
trans-unit.target: 粉碎无歇

trans-unit.resname: RVR·456 | Shattering Spree | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Replicate {R}
trans-unit.target: 覆诵{R}

trans-unit.resname: RVR·456 | Shattering Spree | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Destroy target artifact.
trans-unit.target: 消灭目标神器。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·457 | Perilous Forays | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Perilous Forays
trans-unit.target: 冒险尝试

trans-unit.resname: RVR·457 | Perilous Forays | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {1}, Sacrifice a creature: Search your library for a land card with a basic land type, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
trans-unit.target: {1}，牺牲一个生物：从你牌库中搜寻一张具基本地类别的地牌，将之横置放进战场，然后洗牌。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·458 | Wilderness Reclamation | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Wilderness Reclamation
trans-unit.target: 复归荒野

trans-unit.resname: RVR·458 | Wilderness Reclamation | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your end step, untap all lands you control.
trans-unit.target: 在你的结束步骤开始时，重置所有由你操控的地。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·458 | Wilderness Reclamation | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Walls crack. Buildings fall. Always the wilds return."\n—Domri Rade
trans-unit.target: 「城墙崩毁。高楼坍塌。野地总会复归。」\n～多密雷德

trans-unit.resname: RVR·459 | Niv-Mizzet Reborn | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Niv-Mizzet Reborn
trans-unit.target: 新生尼米捷

trans-unit.resname: RVR·459 | Niv-Mizzet Reborn | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.resname: RVR·459 | Niv-Mizzet Reborn | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, reveal the top ten cards of your library. For each color pair, choose a card that's exactly those colors from among them. Put the chosen cards into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，展示你牌库顶的十张牌。从中为每组双色色组各选择一张颜色正好为该色组的牌。将所选的牌置于你手上，其余则以随机顺序置于你的牌库底。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·460 | Shambling Shell | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Shambling Shell
trans-unit.target: 跛行残躯

trans-unit.resname: RVR·460 | Shambling Shell | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Sacrifice CARDNAME: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
trans-unit.target: 牺牲CARDNAME：在目标生物上放置一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·460 | Shambling Shell | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Dredge 3
trans-unit.target: 发掘3

trans-unit.resname: RVR·461 | Supreme Verdict | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Supreme Verdict
trans-unit.target: 最高裁决

trans-unit.resname: RVR·461 | Supreme Verdict | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: This spell can't be countered.
trans-unit.target: 此咒语不能被反击。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·461 | Supreme Verdict | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Destroy all creatures.
trans-unit.target: 消灭所有生物。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·461 | Supreme Verdict | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Leonos had no second thoughts about the abolishment edict. He'd left skyrunes warning of the eviction, even though it was cloudy.
trans-unit.target: 雷诺兹下令强行排除时没有丝毫犹豫。他甚至还放出天符文示警行动，只可惜当时乌云密布。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·462 | Magewright's Stone | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Magewright's Stone
trans-unit.target: 领法师之石

trans-unit.resname: RVR·462 | Magewright's Stone | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {1}, {T}: Untap target creature that has an activated ability with {T} in its cost.
trans-unit.target: {1}，{T}：重置目标具有起动式异能的生物，且此异能之费用须包含{T}。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·462 | Magewright's Stone | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The stones hark back to an age before civilization, when the living earth blessed all who trod its untamed wilds.
trans-unit.target: 此石能倾听未开化年代之音，当时生机大地仍替踏入不驯荒野者祈福。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·463 | Pithing Needle | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Pithing Needle
trans-unit.target: 穿髓金针

trans-unit.resname: RVR·463 | Pithing Needle | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: As CARDNAME enters the battlefield, choose a card name.
trans-unit.target: 于CARDNAME进战场时，选择一个牌名。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·463 | Pithing Needle | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Activated abilities of sources with the chosen name can't be activated unless they're mana abilities.
trans-unit.target: 除了法术力异能之外，具有该名称之来源的起动式异能都不能起动。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·463 | Pithing Needle | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The fearful want the procedure before a blood festival. The guilty seek it afterward.
trans-unit.target: 怯懦者想在血腥节庆开始之前刺上一针。罪人则是在之后。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·464 | Karn's Bastion | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Karn's Bastion
trans-unit.target: 卡恩关堡

trans-unit.resname: RVR·464 | Karn's Bastion | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {C}.

trans-unit.resname: RVR·464 | Karn's Bastion | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {4}, {T}: Proliferate.

trans-unit.resname: RVR·464 | Karn's Bastion | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "I can't protect everyone here. But those I can, I will."\n—Karn
trans-unit.target: 「我无法保护所有人。但所有能保护的，我都会尽力而为。」\n～卡恩

trans-unit.resname: RVR·465 | Maze's End | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Maze's End
trans-unit.target: 迷宫终点

trans-unit.resname: RVR·465 | Maze's End | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield tapped.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME须横置进战场。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·465 | Maze's End | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {C}.

trans-unit.resname: RVR·465 | Maze's End | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: {3}, {T}, Return CARDNAME to its owner's hand: Search your library for a Gate card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle. If you control ten or more Gates with different names, you win the game.
trans-unit.target: {3}，{T}，将CARDNAME移回其拥有者手上：从你牌库中搜寻一张门牌，将之放进战场，然后洗牌。如果你操控十个或更多名称各不相同的门，则你赢得这盘游戏。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·466 | Thespian's Stage | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Thespian's Stage
trans-unit.target: 悲剧舞台

trans-unit.resname: RVR·466 | Thespian's Stage | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {C}.

trans-unit.resname: RVR·466 | Thespian's Stage | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {2}, {T}: CARDNAME becomes a copy of target land, except it has this ability.
trans-unit.target: {2}，{T}：CARDNAME成为目标地的复制品，但它具有此异能。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·466 | Thespian's Stage | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Amid rumors of war, the third act of The *Absolution of the Guildpact* was quickly rewritten as a tragedy.
trans-unit.target: 在战争的流言中，《十会盟之赦免》的第三幕很快被改写为悲剧。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·467 | Niv-Mizzet, the Firemind | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Niv-Mizzet, the Firemind
trans-unit.target: 炎灵尼米捷

trans-unit.resname: RVR·467 | Niv-Mizzet, the Firemind | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.resname: RVR·467 | Niv-Mizzet, the Firemind | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever you draw a card, CARDNAME deals 1 damage to any target.
trans-unit.target: 每当你抓一张牌时，CARDNAME对任意一个目标造成1点伤害。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·467 | Niv-Mizzet, the Firemind | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: {T}: Draw a card.
trans-unit.target: {T}：抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: RVR·467 | Niv-Mizzet, the Firemind | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: As brilliant as a cut diamond, and with just as cruel an edge.
trans-unit.target: 耀目如晶钻，无情似锐锋。
